text: Otto Hahn (8 March 1879 â€“ 28 July 1968) was a German Nobel Prize winning chemist. He did pioneering research into the atom and he discovered nuclear fission (splitting the uranium atom) in 1938, together with Lise Meitner and Fritz Strassmann. == Other websites == * Otto Hahn - the top 10 greatest scientists * Otto Hahn - the top 100 greatest Germans * Otto Hahn (Great Germans) Biography * Otto Hahn - Famous Scientist The human touch of chemistry. * Otto Hahn - the inventor of atom splitting Visit Berlin, 2011.
